com.taliter.fiscal.device.hasar
Class BasicFiscalDevice

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.taliter.fiscal.device.hasar.BasicFiscalDevice
All Implemented Interfaces:
FiscalDevice
Direct Known Subclasses:
HasarFiscalDevice
public class BasicFiscalDevice
extends java.lang.Object
implements FiscalDevice

A basic FiscalDevice implementation that does not make assumptions about packet contents.
